creditline: Gift of funds from Mr. and Mrs. Wayne H. MacFarlane
description: Sheraton Card Table, about 1810; primary woods mahogany, maple; secondary woods maple, white pine; note elliptical front and hald serpentine sides; inlaid stringing and banding on edge of top and bottom of apron, large inlaid oval encompassed by banding in center of a facade; pictorial inlays of conch shells on pilasters, supported by reeded and ring turned legs.
title: Sheraton Card Table
